title: The CEO is Sanging, Trump in Pittsburgh, The Manns, J-Lo, Sheryl Underwood, Pimpin', Steve Voting, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: The CEO is Sanging, Trump in Pittsburgh, The Manns, J-Lo, Sheryl Underwood, Pimpin', Steve Voting, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Steve is on one as he starts the show today. Trump is in Pittsburgh. David and Tamala Mann call into the show and discuss their upcoming project. Jennifer Lopez is on the latest cover of InStyle Magazine. Sheryl Underwood talks about several important topics. Pimpin' is here for "Pimp Day" and has some fly clothing. Steve stresses the importance of voting to strike a much needed balance. Closing Remarks today covers forgiveness and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
